Name: secondary progressive multiple sclerosis
Definition: A multiple sclerosis that is characterised by a worsening of disability

Name: primary progressive multiple sclerosis
Definition: A multiple sclerosis that is characterized by steady worsening of neurologic functioning

Name: progressive relapsing multiple sclerosis
Definition: A multiple sclerosis that is characterized by steadily worsening symptoms and attacks during periods of remission with disease progression from the onset.

Name: relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis
Definition: A multiple sclerosis that is characterized by relapse (attacks of symptom flare-ups) followed by remission (periods of recovery). Symptoms may vary from mild to severe
